topicsInfo.admissions: Admissions at SNJB COE are conducted through the DTE Maharashtra Centralized Admission Process (CAP). For First Year Engineering, candidates must have passed 12th Science with PCM group and qualify MHT-CET or JEE Main. For Direct Second Year (Lateral Entry), students should have completed a diploma in engineering with at least 45% marks (40% for reserved categories). The admission portal and detailed brochure are available on our official website.
topicsInfo.programs: SNJB COE offers multiple programs. Undergraduate (B.E.) programs include Civil Engineering, Computer Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Electronics & Telecommunication Engineering, and Artificial Intelligence & Data Science. Postgraduate (M.E./MBA) programs include M.Tech in Computer Engineering and a full-time MBA. All first-year students share a common curriculum to build foundational knowledge.
topicsInfo.departments: The college has well-established departments: Civil Engineering (HoD: Dr. A Sharma), Computer Engineering (Prof. B Patil), Mechanical Engineering (Dr. C Pawar), Electronics & Telecommunication Engineering (Prof. D Jadhav), Artificial Intelligence & Data Science (Prof. E More), and MBA (Dr. F Desai). Each department offers modern labs, industry collaborations, and experienced faculty committed to research and innovation.
topicsInfo.placements: SNJB COE has a proactive Training & Placement Cell that prepares students through mock interviews, aptitude sessions, and internships. Top recruiters include TCS, Infosys, Wipro, Cognizant, and other MNCs. The highest package offered has been â‚¹10 LPA, while the average package is â‚¹3.2 LPA. The cell also supports career counseling and overseas education guidance.
topicsInfo.facilities: Our campus is equipped with state-of-the-art infrastructure: modern smart classrooms, dedicated laboratories, a spacious library with digital resources, a 500+ seater auditorium, canteen, hostels, ATM, medical room, Wi-Fi enabled campus, transport buses, and sports facilities like cricket ground, basketball court, indoor gym, and more.
topicsInfo.hostel: The college provides well-maintained separate hostels for boys and girls with 24/7 security, CCTV surveillance, biometric entry, Wi-Fi, mess facilities serving nutritious meals, medical facilities, and in-campus gym access. Hostel life is disciplined yet student-friendly, ensuring academic focus with personal development.
topicsInfo.vision: Our vision is to transform young aspirant learners into creative professionals who contribute to societal development through quality technical education. We aim to instill ethical values, leadership skills, and innovation-driven thinking in our students.
topicsInfo.clubs: SNJB COE supports a vibrant student life through various technical and cultural clubs: Coding Club (hackathons, coding challenges), Robotics Club (robot design and competitions), Entrepreneurship Cell (start-up mentoring), NSS (community service), and Cultural Club (festivals, dance, drama, music events). Students also lead clubs such as Sustainability Cell and Women Empowerment Forum.
topicsInfo.achievements: The college has earned NAAC A+ Accreditation in 2023, NBA Accreditation for multiple departments, and awards like Best Rural Engineering College and AICTE-CII Innovation Award. Students regularly win national-level hackathons, sports meets, and publish research in reputed journals.
topicsInfo.contact: You can reach SNJB COE via Phone: +91-2556-253750, Email: principalcoe@snjb.org, or visit our official website at https://www.snjb.org/engineering/Home. Our campus is located at Neminagar, Chandwad, Nashik, Maharashtra, PIN: 423101.
